Another interesting watch could be "The Way Back Home". It's a life-affirming drama about love, loss, and consequences set in Central Florida. Danny Nucci and Ruby Dee deliver compelling performances in this moving story.

If you're up for something quite different, "The Violent Kind" might be an interesting watch as well. This film tells the story of a group of bikers who are tormented by a savage possession in a secluded farmhouse, and it features Taylor Cole in the cast.

I'd highly recommend "The Monuments Men" for you. It's a compelling drama that revolves around an unlikely group of men during World War II, tasked with rescuing priceless art masterpieces from German thieves and returning them to their rightful owners. The star-studded cast includes George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray, and Hugh Bonneville.

If you're looking for something a bit different, "Psychic Experiment" might pique your interest too. This movie features an intriguing plot about a small self-sufficient community with a dark past, where strange things begin to happen as individuals converge on the enclave. The cast includes Adrienne King and Glenn Morshower. Enjoy your cinematic journey!
